channel.title: Posts on Avengers CTF
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Avengers CTF

item.title: scAvenger Hunt
item.description: Tony Stark in a drunken stupor hid the credentials from hulk somewhere on this website. Can you help hulk in retrieving them? Sometimes what you want is right infront of you. All you have to do is open your eyes and see it. Can you see Hulk_flag[] ? :P Paying attention to small details makes all the difference. Goodluck ~~~ If you are getting paranoid you can refer to the below link to calm your mind xD

item.title: One of these will help you in your quest for glory!!! Million Dollar Question - which one?
item.description: Is it this one….. Grep can be an extremely powerful weapon if you know how to wield the sword. or this one….. Inspect the source code of this webpage.
